contest-event.event-date: Oct. 7, 2000 D National Mineworkers (Championship Section) National Mineworkers (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest National Mineworkers Contest national-mineworkers-championship-section This contest became the Butlins Mineworkers Contest in 2003. Championship The Forest of Dean Winter Gardens (Empress Ballroom), Blackpool, Lancashire, England, UK 1st £1000 2nd £875 3rd £750 4th £625 Jan. 23, 2011, 10:09 p.m. July 9, 2020, 6:14 p.m. 1 Grimethorpe Colliery Band Garry Cutt 2 Fishburn Band Ian Robinson 3 Newtongrange Band David Hirst 4 Newstead Brass Duncan Beckley 5 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band Steve Bastable 6 Thomas Coaches Mid Rhondda Band Jim Davies 7 Riddings Band John Davis 8 Greggs Bakery Band Steve Malcolm
